remarks: Express the binary relation "sequence ` F ` converges to point ` P ` " in a metric space using an arbitrary upper set of integers. This version of ~ lmmbr2 presupposes that ` F ` is a function. (Contributed by NM, 20-Jul-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)
statement:

lmmbrf.8 $e |- ( ph -> F : Z --> X ) $.
lmmbrf $p |- ( ph -> ( F ( ~~>t ` J ) P <-> ( P e. X /\ A. x e. RR+ E. j e. Z A. k e. ( ZZ>= ` j ) ( A D P ) < x ) ) ) $.
